Package index

All functions

merfish_mousePOA
Preprocessed MERFISH dataset of the mouse preoptic area for a bregma -0.29 slice from a female naive animal (Animal ID = 1, Animal Sex = "Female", Behavior = "Naive", Bregma = "-0.29").
